text: Salvador Rueda Santos (3 December 1857 in Benaque - 1 April 1933 in Malaga) was a Spanish journalist and poet. He wrote for the Madrid Gazette and Gaspar Núñez de Arce. In 1910, he toured the Philippines, South America, and Central America. He was a modernist poet. His house in Benaque is a museum. == References == Category:1857 births Category:1933 deaths Category:Spanish poets Category:Spanish journalists
title: Salvador Rueda
